DOC.brief_summary: The study tests the use of a portable mechanical compression device (FM220, Flowmedic, USA) for the treatment of claudication and peripheral arterial disease. Major endpoints are improved exercise tolerance and relevant blood pressure ratios
DOC.brief_title: Intermittent Mechanical Compression For Peripheral Arterial Disease
DOC.criteria: stable claudication with an absolute claudication distance >40 meters but <300 resting ABI in the affected limb <0.8 presence of diabetes
